features: Huggies' Most Absorbent Diaper – Help baby get a full night's sleep with an overnight diaper that has extra absorbency & Double Leak Guards
DryTouch Liner – Baby diapers quickly absorb moisture & provide up to 12 hours of nighttime leak protection
Nighttime Diapers Designed for Comfort – Contoured shape plus SnugFit Waistband & Double Grip Strips provide a secure fit
Drier Nights for Better Mornings – Huggies' Overnites diapers feature a breathable outer cover helps keep skin dry & comfortable, plus wetness indicator
Disposable baby diapers are fragrance free, lotion free, paraben free, and free of elemental chlorine & natural rubber latex
Packaging may vary from image shown
body.description: Say goodnight to midnight changes with Huggies Overnites Diapers, the #1 Best Selling Night-Time Diaper.* Our most absorbent diaper, Overnites are designed to help keep your baby sleeping longer. Huggies' DryTouch Liner includes extra absorbency & locks away moisture for up to 12 hours of overnight protection. With a contoured shape for better leak protection & Double Leak Guards around baby's legs, Huggies Overnites help prevent nighttime diaper leaks & allow your baby to rest comfortably. These disposable overnight diapers also feature Huggies' SnugFit Waistband with Double Grip Strips for a secure fit, perfect for babies starting to roll & toss during sleep. Plus a breathable outer cover helps keep skin dry & comfortable, while Huggies' wetness indicator lets you know if baby needs a diaper change before waking. Huggies Overnites feature adorable Disney Winnie the Pooh designs and are available in size 3 (16-28 lb.), size 4 (22-37 lb.), size 5 (27+ lbs.) and size 6 (35+ lbs.). Join the new Huggies Rewards+ Powered by Fetch to get rewarded fast. Earn points on Huggies diapers and wipes, in addition to thousands of other products to redeem for hundreds of gift cards. Download the Fetch Rewards app to get started today! (*Based on nighttime diaper category sales)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Why OverNites Our Most Absorbent Diaper OverNites Diapers help your child get a full night's sleep with up to 12 hours of protection. Why OverNites DryTouch Liner Soft, durable DryTouch Liner absorbs moisture on contact and helps keep skin clean and healthy. Why OverNites Designed for Comfort Huggies OverNites Diapers are designed with pajama-like softness for comfort all night long. Why OverNites Fragrance-free Hypoallergenic Diapers Free of scents, lotions and elemental chlorine bleaching to protect baby's skin. Why OverNites Best for Sleeping Huggies is here to help with a wide variety of sizes for up to 12 hours of leakage protection. Next page 1 Up to 12 Hour Protection 2 More Absorbency 3 Pajama-Like Softness 4 Free From Irritants 5 Find the Perfect Fit

Find Your Huggies Most Absorbent Wetness Indicator 12 Hour Protection Double Grip Strips Best Fitting Diaper Size 3 - 6 Size Size N - 6 Most Absorbent Wetness Indicator 12 Hour Protection Double Grip Strips Best Fitting Diaper Size 3 - 6 Size Size N - 6 Most Absorbent Wetness Indicator 12 Hour Protection Double Grip Strips Best Fitting Diaper Size 3 - 6 Size Size 3 - 6

What makes OverNites Huggies most absorbent diaper? Huggies OverNites diapers are ideal for nighttime because they combine dreamy softness with 25% more absorbency than Huggies Snug & Dry diapers. Are Huggies OverNites safe for my child’s skin? Absolutely! Huggies OverNites are hypoallergenic and free of fragrance, lotion and elemental chlorine bleaching to protect your baby's soft, sensitive skin. What size do Huggies OverNites go up to? Our overnight diapers offer 4 sizes for your convenience: sizes 3 through 6. What do the Double Grip Strips do? Our patented Double Grip Strips are on all Huggies OverNites diapers. These special grips help keep your baby's diaper securely in place, no matter what they're doing. Do Huggies OverNites diapers expire? There is no shelf life for Huggies OverNites diapers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more night time wake ups!
reviews.reviewText: Finally. My son sleeps through the night! No more leaks and wake ups, no more changing sheets every night. These do a great job for the 10+ hours he sleeps at night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect overnight diaper
reviews.reviewText: I was have trouble with my daughter peeing through her diapers when she started sleeping through the night. I bought these and they are perfect! She sleeps all night and I don't want to wake her to change her. These absorb everything and she is not longer waking up with a wed bed and clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Have not failed me yet!
reviews.reviewText: These are great and reliable! My daughter was peeing through her diaper (yay for a long sleep but boo for morning clean up) so we’ve been using these for about 2 months. We started when she was in size 2 diaper so we were advised to size up at night (although I wasn’t able to find a nighttime diaper smaller than a size 3, across-the-board) but even now that we are in a size 3, during the day, the size 3 nighttime diapers still work really well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Used it for travel and no accidents but when Baby slept on her stomach and urinated a little too much had an accident

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kept baby dry all night

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These last all night ! Won’t leak ! No more 3am changing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars About just as good as a regular diaper
reviews.reviewText: Leaked through on the first night trying. However some nights we don’t leak, so it’s only slightly better.EDIT:Size up 1 size from your baby’s regular size and no leaks!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They actually work and stay in place!
reviews.reviewText: After trying many diapers for nighttime use including 2 other brands nighttime diapers, I tried these. They actually worked. Prior to buying these, I was having to do a middle of the night change due to a leaky diaper at least 3-4 nights a week. This meant changing the diaper, the pajamas, the sleep sack, and the sheets. This also meant a very awake and very unhappy baby. I saw that I could order these in her size and we have not had a diaper leak yet (one week in). Our baby has extremely full diapers in the morning and she is a very active sleeper but these have not leaked once or caused a rash. They stay in place because of the extra Velcro like secure on the tab and the elastic back waistband. They are almost like a cross between the little movers and a night time diaper. Highly recommend to anyone having multiple leaky diapers a week.
Llegaron antes de tiempo ! Excelente producto, realmente duran toda la noche y el pañal no se siente húmedo.
